beats.title: Derive Selection Model

userStory.goal: compute selected fields and sections for the control panel

then: it performs its expected orchestration logic

beats.title: Notify UI
beats.scenario: Publish UI State Change Notifications to Event System

when: notifyUi is invoked with change details
then: an event is published to the central EventRouter within 5ms
and: the event contains element ID, action (add/remove), and class name
the event is stamped with microsecond-precision timestamp

given: multiple class operations occur in sequence
then: events are queued in FIFO order
and: subscribers receive events in the order they occurred
no events are dropped or duplicated

given: a subscriber is registered for UI change events
then: the subscriber receives the event within 20ms
and: the subscriber can act on the notification
multiple subscribers can consume the same event

then: the event is queued with backpressure
and: the operation does not block the caller
events are eventually delivered with bounded latency

then: events are still published for traceability
and: error context is included in event payload
the system can reconstruct the failure chain from events

userStory.goal: selection overlays to reflect current canvas selection, derived deterministically and published to UI in <20ms

movements.businessValue: Enables reliable operations with measurable KPIs; ensures consistent service delivery with SLA compliance (target: 99.9%)
